1.3.4.author: Surge Synth Team
1.3.4.changes:
- Fix a logic error in creating Surge XT folder in new session (#7752) - Paul
- Add 1.3.3 cherry pick list and bump cmakelist version - Paul Walker
- Update tempo after patch load if desired and ensure we calculate time_data.ppqPos while processing (#7738) - Daniel Hatadi
- Update LFO and Step Seq presets to have the LFO EG enabled (#7732) - EvilDragon
1.3.4.description: Hybrid synthesizer featuring many synthesis techniques, a great selection of filters, a flexible modulation engine, a smorgasbord of effects, and modern features like MPE and microtuning.
1.3.4.name: Surge XT

1.3.1.author: Surge Synth Team
1.3.1.changes:
- Fixed bug with audio
- New feature added
1.3.1.description: Hybrid synthesizer featuring many synthesis techniques, a great selection of filters, a flexible modulation engine, a smorgasbord of effects, and modern features like MPE and microtuning.
1.3.1.name: Surge XT

1.1.0.author: Glen MacArthur
1.1.0.description: 11 percussions instruments (Cajon, Woodblock, Handclap, Fingersnap, Bongos, Maracas, Tambourine, Cowbell, Claves, Waterglass) recorded with 5 velocity layers per piece.
1.1.0.name: AVL Drumkits

1.1.0.author: Glen MacArthur
1.1.0.description: Black Pearl and Red Zepplin drumkits recorded with 5 velocity layers per kit piece.
1.1.0.name: AVL Drumkits

1.2.3.author: SFZTools
1.2.3.changes:
Added
- Support for curvecc opcodes on v1 EGs (@PythonBlue)
- Support for lotimer/hitimer (@essej)
Changed
- Allow polyphonic aftertouch (cc 130) to respect the note number, which improves e.g. the choking logic (@essej)
Fixed
- Adjusted the gain compensation on pan stages (@cvde)
- Ensure that voices are cleaned up before being force-reused (@iv-m)
- Fixed a bug in the wavpack wrapper for multichannel files (@KKQ-KKQ)
- Fixed a bug in the way the tuning root was computed (@KKQ-KKQ)
- Fixed a bug where samples would be loaded in RAM twice when using hint_ram_based=1
- Fixed a bug where quasi-simultaneous notes would not properly choke each other
- Don't send a note off event if a note was choked by a CC event.
1.2.3.description: SFZ parser and synth c++ library, providing AU / LV2 / VST3 plugins and JACK standalone client.
1.2.3.name: Sfizz

1.0.0.author: Akai
1.0.0.changes:
- Add Half-pedalling by Peter Eastman
- Add String Resonance simulation created by Peter Eastman
- Cosmetic update
- Optimizing polyphony
- Increase hold and decay time, suggested by Peter Eastman
1.0.0.name: Splendid Grand Piano

3.3.2.author: Paul Battersby
3.3.2.description: Orchestral sample library featuring section and solo instruments for woodwinds, brass, strings and percussion.
3.3.2.name: Virtual Playing Orchestra

1.0.2.author: Jean Pierre Cimalando
1.0.2.changes:
- English translation of the user manual by Bruce Sutherland
- modified KSL editing behavior to make it linear with regards to attenuation
- added a build option to link with system-wide libfmt
- made the resource system compatible with unsigned-char targets
1.0.2.description: FM synthesizer based on OPL3 and OPN2 sound chip emulations. Synthesis of melodic and percussive instruments, support for dynamic parameterization and automation.
1.0.2.name: OPNplug

1.0.2.author: Jean Pierre Cimalando
1.0.2.changes:
- English translation of the user manual by Bruce Sutherland
- modified KSL editing behavior to make it linear with regards to attenuation
- added a build option to link with system-wide libfmt
- made the resource system compatible with unsigned-char targets
1.0.2.description: FM synthesizer based on OPL3 and OPN2 sound chip emulations. Synthesis of melodic and percussive instruments, support for dynamic parameterization and automation.
1.0.2.name: ADLplug

0.2.0.author: Artem Popov
0.2.0.changes:
- Replaces XY modulation with Gradient offset and Warping parameters
- Uses Simplex noise instead of the classic Perlin noise for the oscillator
0.2.0.description: Andes is a software synthesiser plugin in early stages of development. The core of Andes is an original oscillator which uses a pseudo-3D version of Perlin noise to produce distinctively digital sound.
0.2.0.name: Andes

1.3.5.author: Ardura
1.3.5.changes:
- Polyfilter update now works on additive, sampler, and granular sources
- Tilt filter was rewritten to have less crashes/bugs
- VCF Filter instability was fixed with some more safety and balancing changes
- New preset browser and format
1.3.5.description: A Subtractive and Additive Synthesizer, Sampler, and Granulizer built in Rust + Nih-Plug.
1.3.5.name: Actuate
